code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=_ref=>{let{onLogout}=_ref;const location=useLocation();const navigate=useNavigate();const[isMenuOpen,setIsMenuOpen]=useState(false);const isActive=path=>location.pathname===path;const handleNavClick=path=>{navigate(path);setIsMenuOpen(false);};const handleLogout=()=>{onLogout();setIsMenuOpen(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-brand",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logo",children:"\uD83D\uDC8A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"MediTracker"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"hamburger-menu",onClick:()=>setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen),"aria-label":"Toggle menu",children:"\u2630"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-links ".concat(isMenuOpen?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-btn ".concat(isActive('/dashboard')?'active':''),onClick:()=>handleNavClick('/dashboard'),children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-btn ".concat(isActive('/today')?'active':''),onClick:()=>handleNavClick('/today'),children:"Today"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-btn ".concat(isActive('/notifications')?'active':''),onClick:()=>handleNavClick('/notifications'),children:"Notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-btn danger",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]})]});};export default Navbar;
